data.title: Infor Inc Company Profile - Infor Inc Overview
data.meta_description: Up-to-date Infor Inc company overview including funding information, company profile, key statistics, peer comparison and more.
data.text: Infor Inc (Infor), a subsidiary of Koch Industries Inc, is a global leader in business cloud software products. The company primarily focuses on providing industry-specific software solutions to help businesses achieve digital transformation. Its main offerings include Infor Enterprise Cloud, Infor OS (Operating Service), and Infor CloudSuite, which are tailored for various industries and come with built-in analytics, AI, and emerging technology. Infor's products are used by a wide range of customers across industries such as aerospace, automotive, healthcare, and industrial manufacturing, among others. The company operates in the Americas, Europe and Asia-Pacific. Infor is headquartered in New York, the US.
